d.name: v1.37.0
d.body:
# Dragonfly v1.37.0 

## Important stability fixes and changes:
*  Significant memory reduction around json documents #6511 
*  Vector search memory usage is 40% less with hash map documents: #6436 #6437
*  Support of `SORT` command - including `BY` and `GET` options.
*  Several bug fixes around streams:  #6506  #6492 #6532
* Added support for DIGEST and DELEX commands: #6328

## What's Changed
* feat(search): Use stateless allocator for strings by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6285
* chore: Refactor squashed command execution to avoid stub ConnectionContext by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6312
* refactor: add checks to investigate the race condition in slots migration by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6331
* fix(helm): correct security context field placement and disable strict schema validation by @Copilot in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6213
* fix(tests): Use promtool for metrics sanity check by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6318
* fix(search): support parenthesized star in FT.SEARCH queries by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6343
* fix: helm push issue by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6339
* chore: move ReplyBuilder calls in generic_family.cc to new API by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6305
* Add checks for expiration inconsistency by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6346
* feat(hscan): add NOVALUES flag to omit values by @glevkovich in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6325
* chore: refactor SortGeneric function by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6347
* feat: add pagination to cross-shard search by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6352
* refactor: address comments by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6350
* fix(set): SPOP random member even if it contains null bytes by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6361
* fix(server): Set error type when returning -NOGROUP error by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6358
* chore: improvements around sorting algorithm by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6360
* facade: adopt RespSrvParser in server connections by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6356
* feat(server): Support squashing of global eval with single shard by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6321
* fix: memory calculation for OAHSet by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6359
* fix: regtest failure by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6367
* test: use hiredis for reply_builder_test by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6362
* ci: use OIDC for AWS authentication instead of access keys by @AdiCloudbit-DevOps in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6158
* refactor: improve OAHSet::Find() performance by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6373
* chore(server): Simplify InvokeCmd by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6363
* chore(cmake): Update jsoncons to 1.5.0 by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6349
* chore: encapsulate tx object within CommandContext by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6384
* fix(server): support "sort by" option by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6370
* refactor(acl): from facade to server by @kostasrim in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6340
* chore: add copilot env setup steps by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6387
* fix(ci): add AWS env fallbacks for OIDC in composite actions by @AdiCloudbit-DevOps in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6385
* chore: move CommandContext cid to private scope by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6386
* chore(server): Updates around DispatchMC/DispatchCommand by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6351
* fix: compatibility with cpp20 by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6395
* chore: Update CommandContext c'tor by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6393
* feat(server): Add GET option support to SORT command by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6388
* chore: update AGENTS.md by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6392
* Switch to C++20 by @Copilot in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6379
* chore: Clean up DispatchCommand a bit more. by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6397
* fix(core): Remove direct access to RObjWrapper by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6140
* fix: copilot-setup-steps.yml by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6405
* Implement DIGEST and DELEX commands (Redis 8.4.0 compatible) by @Copilot in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6328
* chore: tx clean-ups by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6407
* chore: remove quicklist from the codebase by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6415
* chore(core): CompactObj is_key field, separate encoding by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6253
* chore: wrap list operations within ListWrapper by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6417
* fix: s3 snapshot saving by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6400
* chore(facade): Refactor IoLoop to new interface by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6383
* chore: clarify IterateList interface by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6425
* chore: show slave_repl_offset on replicas when master link is down by @kostasrim in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6353
* fix: reloading vector index by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6422
* chore(search): Simplify SFINAE usage with concepts in defragment-map by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6428
* fix: static assert on macos by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6430
* docs: add async-tiering.md by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6427
* chore(core): Move expire flag to key by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6420
* chore: add ListPack class that wraps c listpack by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6432
* chore: factor out ContainerEntry and QList::Entry into a common class by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6426
* refactor: InvokeCmd by @kostasrim in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6399
* fix: partial sync from same source master with different shard sizes by @kostasrim in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6381
* feat: add hnsw metadata into index serialization by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6429
* fix: QList::iterator semantics by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6439
* tests: Check if tx is initialized before accessing its state by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6446
* chore: support listpack with lists by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6424
* Use async tx for ioloopv2/set by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6433
* feat(server): add protected mode to bind localhost when no password is set by @rafaelperoco in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6442
* tests: Replace pytest with gh workflow by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6453
* CI: remove faulty condition by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6458
* chore(server): Try to simplify build by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6455
* chore: create smalls lists as listpacks by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6450
* chore(tiering): polish type system for better clarity and safety by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6465
* chore: unify auth errors under the same type by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6449
* fix(server): ignore SIGHUP to prevent termination on session closing by @boomballa in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6463
* chore(tiering): refactor stashing to determine serialization upfront by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6470
* Add index serialization by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6461
* docs: add code review instructions for Copilot agents by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6471
* feat(hnswlib): Support using pointer to vector data by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6436
* chore(tiering): refactor Read/Modify to free functions by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6469
* design: stateful async handlers by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6462
* chore: better naming for compression functions in qlist.cc by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6474
* feat(search): Build vector index by using data pointer for HSET objects by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6437
* refactor(facade): decouple pipeline traffic from administrative command queue (phase 1) by @glevkovich in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6423
* chore: bump helio to fix TLS socket crash by @glevkovich in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6480
* feat(search): Omit key defrag is vector data is used as reference by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6454
* chore: sync rax and stream code with Valkey by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6473
* feat(cluster): add range syntax support to DFLYCLUSTER GETSLOTINFO by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6485
* chore: add tiering params and stats to qlist by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6476
* feat(json): Adds a ref-counted blob by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6456
* fix(server): Fix concurrent access to now_streamed_ by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6486
* chore: add more invariant checks for streams (#6459) by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6488
* fix(search): GEO units shouldn't be tokens by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6489
* fix: prevent connected_clients counter leak on replica connection migration by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6491
* feat(json): Adds a reference counted string class by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6497
* fix(tiering): implement qlist symmetric cooloff and fix memory handling by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6496
* chore: Allow JustReply() in cmd-support by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6478
* fix(server): Async index builder, part 1 by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6504
* feat: add shrink to OAHSet by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6513
* feat: send index definition for every thread by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6505
* fix(cmd): Ensure arg slice lifetime by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6514
* fix(hset): delete key if empty after HEXPIRE by @glevkovich in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6503
* chore: Add MinIO support for S3 snapshot tests by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6501
* fix: xreadgroup is a write command by @kostasrim in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6492
* fix: add missing memory tracking on streams by @kostasrim in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6506
* fix: xreadgroup read_history should not stick by @kostasrim in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6523
* feat(search): Async index building (part 2) by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6517
* refactor(facade): separate redis data/control paths (phase 2, final) by @glevkovich in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6477
* feat: add serialization for shard DocId mapping by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6519
* refactor: simplify OAHSet code by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6522
* fix: macOS build by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6526
* feat(hnswlib): Use __builtin_prefetch by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6500
* fix: QUIT pipeline flush by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6518
* fix: allow lazy expiry during global EVAL transactions by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6524
* tests: filter up BullMQ failed tests. by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6533
* fix(tiering): Handle string that are encoded as LONG LONG objects by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6530
* feat(core/search): Range Tree builder by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6520
* fix: always replicate new consumers in xreadgroup by @kostasrim in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6532
* fix(facade): fix migration stats accounting crash by @glevkovich in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6538
* fix(search): Fix search test after async index construction by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6541
* feat(json): Use reference counted strings for json keys by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6511
* fix: search and dfly lib circular dep by @kostasrim in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6543
* fix(search): Avoid second traversal without vector fields by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6539
* chore: reduce includes by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6464
* fix(search): Handle missing fields with GeoIndex by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6550
* feat(server): Plug in RangeTree::Builder by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6537
* fix: hnsw global serialization and add flag for hnsw save\load by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6553
* json: Add test for pool shrinking by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6544
* Remove redundant includes to reduce compilation time by @Copilot in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6548
* fix(search): fix more tests by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6547
* test: search with replication by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6563
* feat(hnsw): Use cosine distance by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6559
* chore: supress maint_notifications client errors by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6569
* Reduce compilation time by removing unnecessary header includes by @Copilot in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6562
* Migrate INCR/DECR/INCRBY/DECRBY command family to AsyncCmd architecture by @glevkovich in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6568
* feat(search): Handle GEO index fields by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6566
* fix(search): Missing vector field should not be zero vector by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6565
* refactor(string): migrate SET, APPEND, PREPEND to async SimpleContext by @glevkovich in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6580
* core/server: Compute memory size of json object using jsoncons API by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6572
* fix: validate interleaved-keys argument count by stored step by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6574
* build: add optional ASAN support for release builds by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6590
* refactor: store hnsw metadata in separate AUX field by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6587
* chore(server): Move vector index construction to builder by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6571
* chore: get rid of deprecated DFLY_PASSWORD env checks by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6586
* fix: reject GAT command sent via Redis protocol instead of crashing by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6592
* fix: handle MEMORY USAGE without key argument instead of crashing by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6597
* server: Change metric type to counter to match redis exporter by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6581
* fix: reject SCRIPT FLAGS with invalid SHA length instead of crashing by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6603
* feat(server): add CLIENT INFO command by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6576
* fix(tls): ub in HandleRequests after first socket read by @kostasrim in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6594
* Consolidate SlowLog tests in server_family_test by @Copilot in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6585
* Refactor server/common.h - Phase 1: Extract common types and statistics by @Copilot in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6582
* test: wait for async indexing completion in test_replicate_all_index_types by @Copilot in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6593
* fix(hnsw): Avoid possible HSET object memory misalignment by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6577
* chore: simplify snapshotting serialization callback by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6595
* server: Record values in histogram atomically by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6583
* Refactor server/common.h - Phase 2: Extract execution state types by @Copilot in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6605
* Extract RespExprBuilder to shared test utils and migrate test_utils to RESPParser with RESP3 support by @Copilot in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6588
* fix: mimalloc page reclamation is too slow by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6575
* feat: add HNSW index deserialization by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6606
* Refactor server/common.h - Phase 3: Extract synchronization primitives by @Copilot in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6612
* Refactor bitops/stream updater storage by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6613
* fix: make ChangeMonitor idempotent to prevent double-add in MULTI/EXEC by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6615
* test: Improve AFL++ fuzzing infrastructure by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6618
* fix: crash on EVALSHA with empty sha by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6620
* fix: string corruption during rdb load by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6621
* make migration more stable by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6616
* chore(regtests): replication missmatching dbnum by @ashotland in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6607
* fix(server): fix OpenSSL shutdown race with mimalloc by @glevkovich in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6626
* fix(fuzz): fix false-green CI and simplify fuzzing workflow by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6632
* fix(server): guard ReadProcStats with __linux__ for macOS compatibility by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6633
* fix: do not overrun stack for asan enabled builds by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6635
* fix(tiering): Fix replication serialization order by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6610
* fix(memcache): reject gat/gats without key instead of crashing by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6639
* feat(server): Extensive slowlog stats for exec/eval by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6584
* fix(facade): Fix missing DFLY_USE_SSL defines by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6636
* fix(memcache): cap store value size with max_bulk_len by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6644
* chore: move simple types to common_types.h and reduce tx_base.h header includes by 52.9% by @Copilot in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6641
* fix(facade): Disable v2 loop for redis by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6643
* test: Add memcache protocol fuzzing support by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6638
* fix(rdb): fix chunked SBF loading for filters >= 4 GiB by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6649
* chore: journal clean-ups by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6622
* fix: test_redis_om by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6655
* fix(tiering): Reduce load on tiering test by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6650
* chore: add logs to rdb_load by @kostasrim in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6642
* Load hnsw index by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6647
* fix(facade): use WriteRef for large values in meta get response by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6657
* refactor: include what you use by @Copilot in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6651
* skip tiering test by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6658
* fix(server): Wait for index load on replication by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6645
* refactor: include what you use by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6660
* feat(tiering): SSD tiering support during slot migration by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6542
* refactor: remove extra includes from headers by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6663
* chore: introduce heavy tests by @Copilot in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6659
* chore: Mark cluster tiering test as heavy by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6671
* fix: backward compatibility for replication regarding HNSW index seri… by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6664

## Huge thanks to all the contributors! ❤️ 

## New Contributors
* @AdiCloudbit-DevOps made their first contribution in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6158
* @rafaelperoco made their first contribution in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6442

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/compare/v1.36.0...v1.37.0

d.name: v1.36.0
d.body:
# Dragonfly v1.36.0 

## Important stability fixes and changes:
1. Support Global Vector index #6103
2. Support unicode tags in #6127
3. django-cacheops compatibility fixes: #6123 #6129
4. better memory defragmentation for json objects: #6240 #6276

## What's Changed
* actions: Add a volume mount to container by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6048
* chore: remove RecvProvided from dragonfly connection by @kostasrim in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6050
* fix(rdb_load): Store streamed items per rdb lodaer by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6049
* fix(search): Result set cutoff by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/5906
* fix: remove duplicate expired/evicted metric header by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6058

* chore: add a tool that creates charts based on memtier metrics data by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6154

* fix: incorrect stalled heartbeat warning by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6155

* chore: introduce common directory by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6170

* chore: clean up sanitizers checks by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6173
* feat(fuzz): improve fuzzing effectiveness, better timeouts, and comprehensive seeds, reproduction tooling by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6166

* fix(search): Fix numeric tree finalization by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6188
* chore: improve backed_args by allowing random access to its arguments by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6189
* Add coordinator connection reusing by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6179
* chore(server): Don't decode size for empty blob by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6194
* chore: hold memcache value in BackedArguments by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6193
* chore(core): Remove some unused CompactObj code by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6141
* feat(search): Simple multi-reader multi-writer mutex for hnsw index by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6156

* fix: macOS test by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6195
* Integrate hiredis by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6198
* fix(search): Use thread lock for hnsw multi reader/multi writer mutex by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6205
* chore: to move some of the command-specific state into CommandContext by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6199
* hset_family: Preserve ttl on increment command by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6186
* Pass CommandContext as a mutable pointer to all the commands. by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6206
* fix: macOS compilation error by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6208
* chore(rax): add move ctor to rax tree, cleanup defragmap  by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6178

* chore: move some SendError calls to CommandContext by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6211

* fix: regression tests by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6212
* feat: add WITHSORTKEYS option to FT.SEARCH by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6210

* feat(search): Yield when rebuilding index by @mkaruza in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6224

* chore: further clean ups around ParsedCommand. by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6223
* docs: create unified AI agent instruction system with AGENTS.md by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6231
* fix(core): Account for size change on json object defragment by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6053
* feat: create a wrapper for hiredis by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6233
* chore: further replace SendError calls with CommandContext by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6236
* chore: simplify memcache pipelining flow by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6230
* chore: reduce reply builder interface by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6237
* chore: swap SendError calls in json_family by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6238
* feat: add open addressing hash set by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/4705
* fix: macOS build by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6239
* chore: reduce compilation dependencies between server and facade by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6242
* chore: switch SendError calls to CommandContext by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6245
* chore: minor fixes around async execution by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6241
* chore: Split CompactObj into Key&Value by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6218
* chore(core): remove unused num_used_buckets_ from DenseSet by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6250
* fix: cross-shard search tests by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6244
* chore: refactor ParsedCommand implementation into a separate file by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6251
* fix: reset obj_malloc_used_ in DenseSet::Clear by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6254
* chore: simplify memcache_parser_test by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6259
* chore(server): Remove more family header definitions by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6255
* chore: MemcacheParser now consumes all the input. by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6260
* chore: an issue of destruction of in-flight parsed commands by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6258
* chore: switch SendError calls in zset_family by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6248
* feat(json): Improve json defragmentation by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6240
* chore: align parse errors with deferred replies by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6261
* chore(server): Split tiering into own cmake target by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6252
* chore(server): Remove some manual acl by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6256
* chore(common): Include cstdint to fix build error on newer fedora versions by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6268
* chore(server): Multi consistency test by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6215
* chore: move memcache reply rendering into MCRender by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6267
* chore: reduce compilation dependencies between facade and server by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6269
* chore(deps): bump the actions group with 4 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6222
* chore: get rid of command specific flags in MCReplyBuilder by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6273
* feat(transaction): Blocking unlock multi by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6246
* fix: macOS build by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6275
* Add alloc size to OAHSet by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6272
* chore: switch SendError calls to CommandContext API by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6270
* chore: implement async dispatching for memcache SET command by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6247
* chore(helio): bump for improved TLS EOF handling by @glevkovich in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6274
* chore(server): Unite family headers by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6266
* chore(server): Use cycle based quota for defragmentation by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6262
* chore: swap ParsedEntry::CmdData with BackedArguments by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6278
* chore(json): Use new json defragmentation by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6276
* fix: loading of a snapshot from a cloud folder by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6280
* chore: fix build error by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6289
* chore: simplify GAT command arguments by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6288
* chore: combine GAT and MGET code together by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6290
* fix: allow Cm_Cache_Backend_Redis Lua scripts by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6292
* fix: CONFIG GET returns numeric bytes for memory configs by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6291
* chore: remove Stored and Deleted interfaces from ParsedCommand by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6287
* fix: macOS build by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6293
* chore: change DispatchCommand interface by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6283
* chore: implement support for deferred mget by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6286
* chore: update .gitignore and clarify TRAFFIC help by @glevkovich in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6294
* chore: optimize experimental_io_loop_v2 flow by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6295
* feat(build): rename cxx_test to helio_cxx_test by @glevkovich in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6297
* chore(server): Remove list family header file by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6296
* Sorting for cluster search by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6301
* feat(server): Allow SELECT inside global/non-atomic exec/eval by @dranikpg in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6302
* chore: introduce RespSrvParser by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6300
* chore: move more reply calls to CommandContext API by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6303
* fix: Handle expired hash fields during RENAME without crashing by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6306
* chore: refresh release settings for dragonfly by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6304
* chore: fix release action by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6308
* test(geo): relax fp checks for Helio Haswell upgrade by @glevkovich in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6307
* Fix fiber stack overflow and improve JSON safety by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6316
* CI: sync valkey tests by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6319
* chore: Add debug information to investigate memcache regtest failure. by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6322
* fix: handle control messages during SquashPipeline iteration by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6313
* chore(defrag): Add defragmentation of search indices by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6281
* CI: Extract common step for syncing valkey tests into action by @abhijat in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6333
* tests: make valkey_search integration tests optional by @vyavdoshenko in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6332
* chore: Reused parsed messages for memcache workloads by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6324
* fix: memcache parser CRLF handling by @romange in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6330

## Huge thanks to all the contributors! ❤️ 

## New Contributors
* @gaganhr94 made their first contribution in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6042
* @glevkovich made their first contribution in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6081
* @Copilot made their first contribution in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6112
* @goochs made their first contribution in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/6150

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/compare/v1.35.0...v1.36.0

d.name: v1.35.1
d.body:
## This is a patch release

## What's Changed
* fix(tiering): improvements around tiering stability #6040 #6086 #6067
* fix(server): replica rejects replicating from itself #6097

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/compare/v1.35.0...v1.35.1

d.name: v1.34.2
d.body:
## This is a patch release

It is strongly advised to update to this version if you use 1.34.0 / 1.34.1 due to regression when Dragonfly runs in  **cache mode**

## What's Changed
* fix(evicition): Don't accumulate deleted bytes if there is no RSS evi… by @BorysTheDev in https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/pull/5908


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/compare/v1.34.1...v1.34.2

d.name: v1.34.1 (Use with caution - see known issues in description)
d.body:
## This is a patch release

## Known issues
https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/issues/5899
https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/issues/5891

### What's Changed

* fix: prometheus is unable to scrape the `/metrics` endpoint #5829

 
**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/dragonflydb/dragonfly/compare/v1.34.0...v1.34.1
